verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
-TROSA AHO
1
<< nananan-trosa aho e :
Nefa tsy nahaonitra >>
<< Trosa ohatrinona moa re ? >>
<< Tsy fantatrao, mavesatra >>.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Hoatrinona, ry Tompo ô !
No onintry ny avotra
handoavanao ny trosako ?
<< Mpanota ô ! fitiavana >>

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jeso niady mba ho ahy
Irery tao Getsemane,
Niaritra hanafaka ahy.
Hoatrinona ? mavesatra e !
Hoatrinona, ry Tompo, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
'Lay hazo fijaliana
'zay nilatsahan'ny ranao,
Moa azoko onerana ?
Hoatrinona, Tompo, lazao ?
Hoatrinona, ry Tompo, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesosy ô ! fitiavam-be
Nandoavanao ny trosako.
Ampio aho hanao hoe :
<< Ho tiako koa Jesosiko >>
Hoatrinona, ry Tompo, sns.
